document.full_text: plans to bury more than 9,000 unidentified remains of people killed in the september 11, 2001 attacks at a national memorial museum have met opposition from a group of families who complain they were not consulted.
document.title: some september 11 victims' families irked by burial plan
lines_and_colors: plans to bury more than 9,000 unidentified remains of people killed in the september 11, 2001 attacks at a national memorial museum have met opposition from a group of families who complain they were not consulted.
